debates.showAs: Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, to define its functions in relation to the preservation, restoration and management of the cultural historical quarter within the Moore Street Battlefield Area in line with the functions, aims and objectives set for it in this Act and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna i ndáil leis an gceathrú chultúir stairiúil laistigh de Limistéar Mhachaire Catha Shráid an Mhúraigh a chaomhnú, a aisiriú agus a bhainistiú de réir na bhfeidhmeanna, na n-aidhmeanna agus na gcuspóirí atá leagtha amach dó san Acht seo agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Latent Defects Redress Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Latent Defects Redress Board, the functions of which shall be, inter alia, to provide resolution to ordinary owners who purchased homes in good faith, in order that such owners have an opportunity to seek mediation or adjudication in relation to non-compliance with building regulations.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Bord um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollais arb iad a fheidhmeanna, inter alia, réiteach a sholáthar do ghnáthúinéirí a cheannaigh teaghaisí de mheon macánta, ionas go mbeidh deis ag úinéirí den sórt sin idirghabháil nó breithniú a lorg i ndáil le neamhchomhlíonadh rialachán foirgníochta.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollais, 2019

debates.showAs: Údarás na Gaeltachta (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for democratic elections to Údarás na Gaeltachta and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toghcháin dhaonlathacha 
chun Údarás na Gaeltachta agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás na Gaeltachta (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Quads and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Quads and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Quads and Scramblers) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2016 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2016 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: Céim an Choiste

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: Rent Certainty and Prevention of Homelessness Bill 2015: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rent Certainty and Prevention of Homelessness Bill 2015: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rent Certainty and Prevention of Homelessness Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing Act 1988 and the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to update the definition of "homelessness" to more appropriately address the needs of people experiencing homelessness, to bring the task of homelessness prevention within the remit of the Housing Act 1988, and to provide for rent certainty in the private rental market and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe, 1988 agus an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun an míniú ar "easpa dídine" a uasdátú chun aghaidh a thabhairt, ar shlí níos oiriúnaí, ar riachtanais daoine atá gan dídean, do thabhairt an taisc arb éard é easpa dídine a chosc faoi réim Acht na dTithe, 1988, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cinnteacht cíosa sa mhargadh príobháideach cíosa agus le haghaidh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Rent Certainty and Prevention of Homelessness Bill Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chinnteacht Cíosa agus um Easpa Dídine a Chosc, 2015

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Referral to Select Committee
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: Second Stage [Private Members]
Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Road Traffic Act 2004 to provide for an additional speed limit, an additional special speed limit and related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le luasteorainn bhreise, luasteorainn speisialta bhreise agus nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Leasú), 2015

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 1996 to provide protection to applicants who have been prohibited from availing of social housing by virtue of the applicant's legal or beneficial interest in the residence in which the applicant and respondent previously resided
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 1996, do thabhairt cosaint d'iarratasóirí atá toirmiscthe ar leas a bhaint as tithíocht shóisialta de bhua leas dlíthiúil nó tairbhiúil an iarratasóra san áit chónaithe ina raibh cónaí ar an iarratasóir agus ar an bhfreagróir roimhe sin

debates.showAs: Misuse of Motor Vehicles (Public Spaces) Bill 2012: Second Stage
Misuse of Motor Vehicles (Public Spaces) Bill 2012: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give powers to an Garda Síochána to deal with the use of motor propelled vehicles in areas designated public spaces by local authorities
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt cumhachtaí don Gharda Síochána chun déileáil le húsáid feithiclí mótarghluaiste i limistéir arna n-ainmniú ag údaráis áitiúla mar spásanna poiblí
bill.shortTitleEn: Misuse of Motor Vehicles (Public Spaces) Bill 2012
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Mí-Úsáid Mótarfheithiclí (Spásanna Poiblí), 2012
